author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-5737. Fixes a problem in the way the JobTracker used to talk to other daemons like the NameNode to get the job's files. Also adds APIs in the JobTracker to get the FileSystem objects as per the JobTracker's configuration. Contributed by Amar Kamat.

author: angela
msg: - VersionHistory.getAllFrozenNodes()  (move iteratoradaptor from core to jcr-commons), VersionHistory.getVersionableIdentifier()
- VersionManager (work in progress): 170-methods, shallow merge, checkpoint
JCR-2003: JCR2SPI / SPI: Add support for JCR 2.0
JCR-2004: Update SPI locking to match JCR 2.0
- separate JCR LockManager from the internal lock manager

author: hiranya
msg: Fixed a problem in synapse_samples_154.xml (See Synapse-547)

author: ltheussl
msg: [DOXIA-318] book descriptor element <date> not properly translatetd for latex output
